tool.name: Multiple Region Extraction

param.name: input_vcf
param.label: VCF file to ektract regions from

param.name: input_region
param.label: Region text file. In format chr:regionFrom-regionTo line seperated

param.name: dbsnp_annotation
param.label: Perform dbsnp annotation
param.help: The regions will be annotated with RSIDs from dbSNP if no region is selected.

tool.help:
Multi region extraction takes a text file contaning regions to be extracted line seperated in ChR:regionTo-RegionFrom
example text file.
3:4343-21234521
4:32132-1231251
5:534324-432434242
6:432-3262
etc.....
The tool also contains the option to perform dbsnp annotation which will add RSIDs for the variants that already exist in the DBSNP database.
Credits
Samtools Tabix is used to index a vcf file. http://samtools.sourceforge.net/
SnpSift is used to annotate from the dbSNP database.
SnpSift is written by Cingolani, P. "snpEff: Variant effect prediction", http://snpeff.sourceforge.net, 2012.
